TypeSignature.Value: public delegate object ServiceCreatorCallback(IServiceContainer container, Type serviceType);
.class public auto ansi sealed ServiceCreatorCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ServiceCreatorCallback(container As IServiceContainer, serviceType As Type) As Object
public delegate System::Object ^ ServiceCreatorCallback(IServiceContainer ^ container, Type ^ serviceType);
type ServiceCreatorCallback = delegate of IServiceContainer * Type -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 请求创建服务的服务容器。

span.span: The service container that requested the creation of the service.
The type of service to create.

summary.span: 提供一种回调机制，它可以即需创建服务的实例。

span.span: Provides a callback mechanism that can create an instance of a service on demand.

returns.span: 由 指定的服务；如果未能创建服务，则为 。

span.span: The service specified by , or if the service could not be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供了一种机制，用于发布可请求在需要时创建的服务，而不是在设计器加载时立即创建的服务。 provides a mechanism to publish services that you can request to have created when needed, rather than the service being created immediately when the designer loads. 如果服务不是必需的并且不能使用，则可以使用回调函数。You can use a callback function if the service is not essential and may not be used. 使用 发布的服务不会使用更多的资源（如果没有请求和创建）。A service published by using a does not use as many additional resources if it is not requested and created. 若要使用回调函数发布服务，请将 传递给 的 方法。To use a callback function to publish your service, pass a to the method of an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用回调函数发布服务。The following code example shows how to publish a service using a callback function. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
